ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate
1 cup cherry-flavored rum (such as Bacardi Torched CherryÂ®)
5 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles beer (such as BudweiserÂ®), or more if needed
des: "This is an absolutely delicious drink that is perfect on a hot day!"
ins: Fill a large pitcher a quarter-full of ice. Add limeade and rum; stir with a spoon to combine. Pour in enough beer to fill the pitcher. Mix to combine.
